Package prkmodel.repast

Class RepastNervousSystem

java.lang.Object
prkmodel.types.templates.DefaultNervousSystem
prkmodel.repast.RepastNervousSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
NervousSystem
public final class RepastNervousSystem extends DefaultNervousSystem
Extension of the DefaultNervousSystem class tailored for the Repast Simphony framework. It incorporates additional Repast-specific features such as scheduled methods and integration with the Repast context, space, and network.
Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95

  • Constructor Details

    • RepastNervousSystem

      public RepastNervousSystem(int xdim, int ydim, int zdim, double mitoTransferThreshold, int lewyBodyDegenerationThreshold, double baseDegenerationProbability, int mitochondriaPerNeuron)
      Constructs a new RepastNervousSystem with the specified dimensions and parameters.
      Parameters:
      xdim - the X dimension of the nervous system
      ydim - the Y dimension of the nervous system
      zdim - the Z dimension of the nervous system
      mitoTransferThreshold - the mitochondria transfer threshold
      lewyBodyDegenerationThreshold - the lewy body degeneration threshold
      baseDegenerationProbability - the base degeneration probability
      mitochondriaPerNeuron - the number of mitochondria per neuron
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any dimension is invalid

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step()
      Scheduled method to perform regular steps in the simulation. This method is called by the Repast Simphony scheduler at regular intervals. If there are no neurons left, the simulation run will end.
      Specified by:
      step in interface NervousSystem
      Overrides:
      step in class DefaultNervousSystem

    • filterOutNeurons

      public RepastNervousSystem filterOutNeurons()
      Filters out neurons from the nervous system. Additionally removes the mitochondria of neurons with no adjacent neurons from the Repast context.
      Specified by:
      filterOutNeurons in interface NervousSystem
      Overrides:
      filterOutNeurons in class DefaultNervousSystem
      Returns:
      the updated nervous system
      See Also:
      • Neuron
